hero.title: Your Idea, Live in 2 Weeks
hero.subtitle: Get your MVP free of charge, only pay when you are amazed by the result.
services.title: Our Services
services.subtitle: Tailored solutions to launch your idea faster than ever
services.strategic.title: Strategic Coaching
services.strategic.description: One-on-one expert coaching by an experienced founder to help validate and refine your idea. We'll work together to define your MVP and create a roadmap for success.
services.development.title: Rapid MVP Development
services.development.description: We bring your MVP to life in just 2 weeks. Focus on your core business while we handle the technical implementation, delivering a fully functional product ready for user testing.
services.funding.title: Funding Guidance
services.funding.description: We assist startups in securing government funding to support their growth and development.
services.funding.features.2: Support for startups in North Rhine-Westphalia
services.funding.specialNote: * This funding is specific to NRW, but we can support startups in other regions as well.
approach.title: Our 3D Approach to MVP Success
approach.subtitle: A proven methodology to turn your idea into a market-ready product
approach.steps.discovery.title: Discovery
approach.steps.discovery.description: Together we dive deep into your idea, market, and goals to create a solid foundation for your MVP. Our guidance helps refine your concept for maximum customer validation.
approach.steps.development.title: Development
approach.steps.development.description: We bring your MVP to life in just 2 weeks, using cutting-edge technologies. We focus on core features that demonstrate your product's value to real customers.
approach.steps.delivery.title: Delivery
approach.steps.delivery.description: We present your fully functional MVP, ready for user testing. So far this has been completely free of charge. If you're not amazed by your MVP right now, you don't have to buy it. The only thing you have to invest is 2 weeks of our time.
why.title: Why Founders Choose RapidWorks
why.subtitle: Unmatched speed, expertise, and support for your journey
why.features.founders.title: Built By Founders, For Founders
why.features.founders.description: We understand your unique challenges and time constraints because we've been there ourselves.
why.features.speed.title: Lightning Fast Development
why.features.speed.description: Get your MVP in just 2 weeks, accelerating your time to market and investor pitches.
why.features.risk.title: Risk-Free Engagement
why.features.risk.description: Free consultation and 2-week development period. Pay only when you're satisfied with your MVP.
why.features.funding.title: Government Funding Support
why.features.funding.description: For startups in North Rhine-Westphalia, we assist in applying for government funding covering 70% of our services.
postMVP.title: Our Offer After Your MVP
postMVP.subtitle: Continue your journey with flexible, high-quality development support
postMVP.features.hours.title: 1,000 Hours of Development
postMVP.features.hours.description: Access a pool of 1,000 development hours to use as needed. Start and stop at your convenience.
postMVP.features.developer.title: Dedicated Developer
postMVP.features.developer.description: Work with the same developer throughout the year, ensuring consistency and deep understanding of your project.
postMVP.features.payment.title: Flexible Payment
postMVP.features.payment.description: Pay only for the hours worked, billed at the end of each month. Cancel anytime with no long-term commitment.
